summary: Display error marks on line which contain errors after compilation
name: cuteErrorMarker
description:
Display a mark on lines which contain compilation errors listed on the quickfix window.

Screenshots :
http://img34.imageshack.us/gal.php?g=gvimsupercutennesswithk.png

Tested on :
- Ubuntu 9.04 (GVim && vim)
- Windows XP/Vista/7
install_details:
drop the files in your ~/.vim or ~/vimfiles
(can work in $VIM and $VIMRUNTIME folder, but favor dropping it in your profile dir)
